original_title: Aniceto do Império: Dia de Alforria
overview: Zózimo Bulbul’s film is dedicated to Zumbi dos Palmares and to all Maroons dead and alive. It portrays the life of Aniceto, who was 72 years old at the time: a union leader, a stevedore at the Rio de Janeiro port and founder of Escola de Samba Império Serrano
title: Aniceto do Império: Dia de Alforria
